descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... A 3x3 pattern with a certain color or simply grey
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... Remains the same size as the input grid
descriptions.description_output_instructions: To make the output, you have to... The output will be replaced entirely with a specific solid color. The color that you is choose is a result of the pattern that you are given.If you get an inverted cross pattern, fill the entire output red.If you get a 2x2 square in the upper right with one square in the bottom left, fill the entire output green.If you get a cross pattern, fill the entire output magenta.If you get an inverted cross pattern with a square filled in the upper left, fill the entire output dark blue.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a 3x3 grid with four boxes in black and five boxes in a different color
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...does not change but the grid is not segmented into small boxes.
descriptions.description_output_instructions: To make the output, you have to...consider the pattern of the colored boxes. where the colored boxes form a cross, the output color should be pink.where there are three colored boxes at the top left corner the output color should be blue. Where there are four colored boxes at the top right the output color should be green. Where the colored boxes are at the middle of each of the first and third column and in the middle column the colored boxes are at the top and bottom, the output color should be red.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a 3x3 grid, with colored squares, fill in the grid so that four of the squares are black.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...stays the same
descriptions.description_output_instructions: To make the output, you have to...make sure that 4 of the squares are black.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a 3 by 3 grid filled with different colored squares.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...will change to a 1 by 1 square.
descriptions.description_output_instructions: To make the output, you have to...see which design you have. if you have two black lines that are 2 squares long, one coming down from the top left, and one going left from the bottom right, your output will be a green square.If you have a grey cross that is filled in, your output is a magenta square. If you have a black cross, with the middle square filled in with a different color, your output will be an orangey red. If you have a cross of a different color, with the middle square black, and the upper left square filled in with the color as well, then your output will be a blue square.
